item.description:
Judy and I changed the day to this Sunday the 5th for Hanks Dairy Bar in Plainfield, Conn.

This will be about 180 Miles round trip. We could make a few more miles on it if we add in Woodstock, Conn. They have a good apple orchard there.

The web link to Hanks is http://www.hanksdairy...

Check out their menu or entertainment that will be there that day.

We can meet at 9:30 and leave at 10:00. We will take a little highway, then head for the secondary roads.

We thought Sunday would be a better travel day as this is a long weekend, thinking Sat and Mon would be the busiest....... So.... Sunday it is for Women on Wheels to Hanks.......
item.name: Hanks Dairy Bar in Plainfield, Conn.
